name: Happy Stack Ball
description:
Happy Ball is a Brand New Stack Ball Game, 3D Ball Arcade game with more than 300 plus Levels, Stack Ball 3D Game where players smash, bump and bounce through revolving helix platforms to reach the end.

Sound easy? You wish!!
Your ball smashes like a brick through colorful platforms that block its descent, but if you hit a black one, it's all over! Your ball shatters to pieces and you have to start your fall all over again.
But even black platforms are no match for a fireball falling at full speed! Choose your strategy: speed up like a madman
